item.title: SWN
item.description: score:182 Chances: Higher institutional ownership indicates stock price sensitivity to institutional trading activity. Higher oil production and reduction in marketing purchases contributed to positive Q4 earnings. The longer-term bull case for natural gas is based on expanding U.S. exports, benefiting companies like Southwestern Energy.

item.title: PCG
item.description: score:40 Chances: PG&E Corporation Foundation offering STEM scholarships to support education and future talent in Science, Technology, Engineering and Math (STEM) disciplines. Risks: Inflation and higher natural gas prices are impacting utility investors and may lead to increased costs for customers. Score:40 chances characters count - risks characters count = 40
